meanings.sent1: The scientist studied a tribasic compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The tribasic acid reacted with the metal to form a new substance.
meanings.sent3: The tribasic solution bubbled and fizzed like a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of tribasic chemistry was as solid as a three-legged stool.
meanings.sent5: The tribasic nature of the substance made it highly reactive.

meanings.definition: Containing three basic atoms or groups.
meanings.sent1: The tribasic molecule had a unique structure.
meanings.sent2: The compound was identified as tribasic due to its composition.
meanings.sent3: The tribasic formula seemed like a secret code to the students.
meanings.sent4: The tribasic structure of the crystal lattice was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The tribasic nature of the element made it stand out in the periodic table.
